meanings.definition: A person who explores new or unfamiliar places.
meanings.sent1: The young explorer ventured into the dense forest to discover hidden treasures.
meanings.sent2: The explorer traveled to distant lands in search of ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The explorer got lost in the supermarket while looking for the cereal aisle.
meanings.sent4: Her curious mind turned her into an explorer of the unknown realms of science.
meanings.sent5: The brave explorer faced many dangers on his quest to reach the mountain peak.

meanings.definition: A program or tool used to navigate and search for files on a computer.
meanings.sent1: The new explorer software helped organize all the documents on the computer.
meanings.sent2: She used the explorer to find the folder containing her photos.
meanings.sent3: The explorer program made it easy to track down the missing file.
meanings.sent4: With the explorer tool, he quickly located the spreadsheet he needed.
meanings.sent5: The explorer application simplified the process of finding important files.

meanings.definition: A spacecraft or vehicle designed for exploring outer space.
meanings.sent1: The explorer spacecraft was equipped with advanced technology for deep space missions.
meanings.sent2: NASA launched the explorer to study distant planets in our solar system.
meanings.sent3: The explorer shuttle made a smooth landing on the alien planet.
meanings.sent4: The explorer probe transmitted fascinating data from the edge of the galaxy.
meanings.sent5: The explorer spaceship embarked on a historic journey to the far reaches of the universe.
